website_summaries.verdict: The best option if you want pure comfort out of a large sectional.
pros: Built-in recliners provide plenty of space to sprawl out for four people on the couch
cons: Outdated look that doesn't offer any style

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Material is a fuzzy brown material with wavy pattern, fuzz is about quarter inch long. Reminds me of a blanket. Should hide spills fairly well. Cup holders are plastic with silver paint. Seats are comfy and have good depth, both ends of the couch recline fine so far. It's quite large, but its not designed for laying down, but knew that going into the purchase. Two of the boxes were heavy. The center backs were hidden underneath the end benches. Once I found them the rest of the assembly was pretty much self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: I love the couch
customer_reviews.text: The delivery took almost 2 weeks longer than promised. The seller called me, apologized for their error, and said they would issue me a 10% refund. That was about 2 weeks ago and I still don't have the refund. After I finally received the couch one of the recliners would not recline (see picture). I had to take a hammer to the metal to remove the obstruction. However, even with all of these issues, I love the couch. It's very comfortable and the quality is excellent for the price. I highly recommend; just be prepared to deal with some headaches along the way.
customer_reviews.author: John Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch in March and I’m completely disappointed. I love the color, it feels nice, and the reclining ends are mostly comfortable, but the rest of it is not. The middle part is sinking in and uneven, the back piece behind one of the storage containers broke and falls so we had to use a rope to tie it until I can figure out what to do. I don’t have money to sink into items that don’t hold up and I’m completely disappointed. I’ve emailed the manufacturer so hopefully something can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon G.

customer_reviews.title: Since the purchase of the couch, I am having ...
customer_reviews.text: Since the purchase of the couch, I am having difficult time to pull the extra pieces of cushions out of the small compartment in the back of the couch. We still can not be able to remove the the two pieces after a long struggle due to the wooden frames on the cushions. We may need someone from the company to come over and help out with the removal of the cushions without damaging the couch. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carolmarie

customer_reviews.title: looks great and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: looks great and is very comfortable. My only concern is the longevity of this couch. It is not as sturdy as I was hoping for. For the price I was hoping it was going to be built a little stronger. I have only had it for a day and I'm satisfied overall. Just not sure I would recommend to someone that was looking for durability along with comfort and the price margin.
customer_reviews.author: BRENT WEBER

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this sectional!!! I would have given 5 stars but my husband had a little trouble putting it together (ships in 3 boxes and u have to put the sides and backs on) but sooo worth it! Super plush and soft and comfortable! We bought this is brown and it's beautiful. Also came with 2 storage bins built in with 2 sets of cup holders which I didn't expect it to have. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Holgate

customer_reviews.title: it's pleasing to look at and it's rather comfortable! The shape is a bit awkward in our ...
customer_reviews.text: We were a little iffy ordering a couch online since I have ordered 2 couches before and they were extremely disappointing. We waited over a week after the expected date and it was almost impossible to get anyone from the delivery company on the phone. We have a family of 7 and we all fit on the couch, it's pleasing to look at and it's rather comfortable! The shape is a bit awkward in our living room, but overall it was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfortable couch
customer_reviews.text: This couch is as wonderful as the other buyers have stated. I'm 5'9" and this couch has a nice tall back and sits high off the floor. The recliners are great. It was also super easy to assemble, took about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: This sectional is fantastic. I am so pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is fantastic. I am so pleased with it. This is in my living area. It’s really beautiful! And it’s a lot bigger than it looks. I absolutely love it. So soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: It a well made firm couch that doesn’t disappoint on comfort
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfy than the leather version. It a well made firm couch that doesn’t disappoint on comfort. The recliners are smooth and durably not flimsy at all and I’m 230 and a bit tougher on my environment than probably most. At least that’s what my ex wife would tell you..
customer_reviews.author: T. Serviis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good price point!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. So far it seems like a really great buy. Only complaint, is the middle is held together by a small hooking section on both sides, making it difficult to move. The recliners on both ends work great, so far-so good!
customer_reviews.author: Wise2007

customer_reviews.title: The retailer was very nice but it is too much of a pain to ...
customer_reviews.text: products came damaged due to freight, no fault of suppliers, however, not worth the risk. The retailer was very nice but it is too much of a pain to try to return and also have to hold on to the boxes until settled. They gave us a refund but still our burden to get rid of the couch. The couch looked nice and was very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this sectional
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sectional. The color is perfect, just like advertised. Its soft but firm and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this couch
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch! Very easy to assemble if you have a little mechanical ability. Back section of cup holders are removed from the bottom of the couch, not the zipper compartment at back of couch. Delivery was one week after expected date but no big deal. Well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McKimson

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly as it looks and it’s perfect for my living room.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sectional! It’s soft, comfortable, and everything I was looking for. Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lieter

customer_reviews.title: Came in three pretty good size boxes and soooo easy to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Other than it taking a couple weeks to get here this sectional is well worth it! Came in three pretty good size boxes and soooo easy to put together a lot bigger than I expected but I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sofa !!
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is so pretty and very comfortable. Had it a month now and seats appear to maintain their shape.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: but I’m so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous ordering this sectional, especially since no one had posted about the charcoal color, but I’m so glad I did. It’s so soft! My family loves it. I placed the order on the 9th and I got the call to schedule delivery on the 14th.
customer_reviews.author: Kale0209

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Amazingly soft and plush. Nicer looking then the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn K Henninger

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! It came in three boxes, the backs need to be attached which was very simple just slide them in to slots and push down until it clicked. it is very sturdy and very comfortable. the one thing that i was not ready for (which has nothing to do with the sectional) was the delivery which was from a delivery company not a furniture company, which means they only deliver to the door they will not bring it in or set it up. the company I had was very polite and great at their job
customer_reviews.author: James ensley

customer_reviews.title: ... was thrilled when it arrived on time and very easy to get together
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary to say the least ordering furniture online but I was thrilled when it arrived on time and very easy to get together. Very big and comfortable! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Sobczak

product_meta.title: Classic Large Linen Fabric L Shape Sectional Recliner Sofa Couch (Hazelnut)
product_meta.description: Divano Roma Furniture- Big classic oversize and overstuffed linen fabric recliner sectional l shaped sofa. 2 end seats recline to full horizontal position with storage compartment on one arm rest to store tv remote controls. Soft waffled linen fabric upholstery with overstuffed seats to bring maximum comfort to you and your family. Can sit 5 to 6 people - perfect for a big family room to watch movies from the comfort of your own home
feature_bullets: Big classic oversize and overstuffed linen fabric recliner sectional l shaped sofa.
2 end seats recline to full horizontal position with storage compartment on one arm rest to store tv remote controls
Soft waffled linen fabric upholstery with overstuffed seats to bring maximum comfort to you and your family
Can sit 5 to 6 people - perfect for a big family room to watch movies from the comfort of your own home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
